betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§6Signalum§r is the §ethird tier of the Upgrades§r. You can also use a §6Conversion Kit§r instead of an §6Upgrade Kit§r to §edirectly convert the block into that tier§r without needing to have the previous tier upgrades.

To craft one, you'll need 4 §6Signalum Ingot§rs, a §6Electrum Gear§r, and 2 §6Cryotheum Dust§rs.
